TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContentLocatorGroup extends System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase implements class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable

Docs.summary: Represents an ordered set of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"> elements that identify an item of content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements defined within a ContentLocatorGroup provides a structured means to refer to an external data item.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup">.
Docs.returns: A modifiable deep copy clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup">.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This Clone method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects. For convenience, Clone shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. For more details, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.`
When copying dependency properties, Clone copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.

Docs.summary: Always returns `null`. See [Annotations Schema](../Topic/Annotations%20Schema.md) for schema details.
Docs.returns: Always `null`. See [Annotations Schema](../Topic/Annotations%20Schema.md) for schema details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks GetSchema is provided to fulfill the contract of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable> interface.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"> elements that make up this <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>.
Docs.value: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator"> elements that make up this <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> collection returned will never be `null`. If the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> contains no <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> objects, the returned collection will contain zero elements.
